originalText.text: This place has changed my son's life!!!! My son was quiet and shy the sweetest boy you could ever meet BUT with that came the BULLYING he was constantly getting picked on and bullied in school, it was a complete nightmare! So I put my baby in karate... and the difference in just a few months is amazing!! The conference he's developed since going to DAOS Martial Arts is truly a blessing. As a mom I have a million and one things to worry about but my baby being able to protect his self when it's necessary isn't one anymore.

originalText.text: Honestly speaking enrolling my son is the best decision I’ve ever made, not only does martial arts place a part in discipline but I notice a huge transition in his behavior at home, & even school! If you’re looking to help your child channel that extra energy with an extra curriculum activity, this is definitely the way to go. The instructors are extremely patient for the little ones, who may need that extra attention, & even take part in activities outside of practice for example we recently went out a trip skating which gave both the kids & parents a chance to connect and bond aside from martial arts! The instructors treat you like family you will not be disappointed!

originalText.text: This has been an absolutely wonderful experience thus far. The staff and the instructors are first rate. I can't begin to explain how much my son's confidence has grown since attending this institute.  The care, concern and attention to detail is unmatched. And most importantly, I love that the instructors really seem to care. They crave the opportunity to give extra instruction. You can tell it is more than just a job for them. And that is what I love most. I would highly encourage that anyone with children come by and check it out for themselves. I guarantee that you will  deem the experience as a necessary, yet enjoyable benefit for your child.

originalText.text: Very welcoming environment and friendly. My child is enjoying karate and boxing. She’s determined to apply the skills taught in class. It’s only been 1 week and she’s receiving great feedback. I’m highly impressed. And would highly recommend!

originalText.text: In the world we live in self defense is needed, especially for our kids. DAOS Martial Arts Instructors are the best!  They are excellent instructors. They care about you learning and teach with patience. They are the best instructors for children!!
